job.title: Machine Learning research Engineer
job.description: pstrongML Research EngineerstrongppLOCATION San Francisco CA USnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspppbrppFull TimeppstrongABOUT the rolestrongppIn this role youll work with our researchers to do cuttingedge deep learning researchconducting experiments creating infrastructure and developing tooling amp visualizationswith the goal of developing more humanlike machine intelligenceppstrongExample projectsstrongpulliImplement a selfsupervised network using contrastive and reconstruction lossesliliCreate a library on top of PyTorch to enable efficient network architecture searchliliImplement networks from newly published papersliliRun massively parallel experiments to understand all variants of an architectureliliDevelop more realistic simulations for training our agentsliliCreate visualizations to help us deeply understand what our networks learn and whyliulpstrongBenefitsstrongpulliWork directly on creating software with humanlike intelligenceliliGenerous compensation equity and benefitslili20K yearly budget for selfimprovement coaching courses conferences etcliliActively cocreate and participate in a positive intentional team cultureliliSpend time learning reading papers and deeply understanding prior workliliFrequent team events dinners offsites and hanging outliulpstrongABOUT youstrongpulliPassionate about understanding the fundamentals of intelligenceliliVery comfortable writing PythonliliExcited to be a worldclass ML engineerliliA fan of pair programmingliliPassionate about engineering best practicesliulpnbspppnbspp
